title: Crypto Exchange Ripio Reveals $100M Crypto Treasury, Second Largest in Latin America
contentSnippet: The company's holdings, which include bitcoin and ether, have been managed through trading and hedging strategies since 2017.

title: JPMorgan says Strategy could face billions in outflows if MSCI and other major indices remove it
contentSnippet: Strategy could see about $2.8B in outflows if MSCI removes it from its indices, and another $8.8B if other index providers follow.

title: Ray Dalio Still Owns Bitcoin, but Says Traceability and Quantum Threat Are Concerns
contentSnippet: The billionaire founder of hedge fund Bridgewater believes Bitcoin faces major hurdles before it can become a global reserve currency.

title: British fraud office arrests two men accused of $28 million Basis Markets rug pull
contentSnippet: The Basis Markets project raised $28 million in late 2021, but never launched the platform it claimed to be working on, and went dark shortly after, offering no refunds.

title: Bitcoin, Ethereum and XRP Dive as Rate Cut Hopes Fade, Liquidations Near $1 Billion
contentSnippet: Bitcoin is being battered again Thursday, falling below the $87,000 mark for the first time in seven months as liquidations top $900 million.

title: Introducing Layer One: Poker Logic Meets Crypto Reality
contentSnippet: Haseeb Qureshi and Sean Lippel join Kelvin Sparks and Steven Gates on first episode of The Block's latest podcast produced with Avalanche – Layer One.

title: NVDA Earnings Call Pumps Crypto briefly! BTC then dumps to $87,000!
contentSnippet: Crypto majors are slightly green and rebounding after a strong NVDA earnings beat lifted broader markets, with BTC up 1% to $91,800, ETH down 2% to $3,020, BNB down 2% to $900, and SOL up 2% to $142.

title: Core Foundation Secures Injunction Against Maple Finance Over Bitcoin Yield Product
contentSnippet: Core Foundation alleged that partner Maple Finance has misused confidential information to create a rival Bitcoin yield product.

title: HBAR Faces Fresh Liquidity Alarms After Breakdown to $0.1373
contentSnippet: Hedera’s token slipped below key support levels as a late-session trading halt, collapsing volume, and failed recovery attempts point to mounting structural and liquidity stress.

title: 21Shares Doubles Dogecoin Bets With 2x Leveraged DOGE ETF
contentSnippet: TXXD targets risk-tolerant investors and joins a growing list of altcoin-tracking funds that have recently listed on U.S. exchanges.

title: ICP Breaks Below Key Support as Volume Surges at Resistance Test
contentSnippet: Heavy trading activity during a failed rebound attempt pushed ICP into a tighter consolidation zone below $4.95, reinforcing short-term downside risk.

title: The Rise of Crypto Treasuries: How One Bet Sparked a Corporate Shift
contentSnippet: Michael Saylor’s 2020 move turned idle cash into crypto. Now, firms from healthcare to tech are following the playbook, with mixed results.

title: Bitcoin's Nvidia-Led Gains Prove Short-Lived, With Price Slumping Back to $88K
contentSnippet: U.S. stocks are also giving up a major early advance, with the Nasdaq now ahead just 0.3%.

title: BONK Holds Range as Heavy Volume Marks Key Support Retest
contentSnippet: The Solana memecoin stayed locked in a wide consolidation band, with surging volume confirming both a resistance rejection and subsequent recovery.

title: Proposed Bitcoin for America Bill Would Enable BTC Tax Payments, Which Go to Reserve
contentSnippet: Introduced Thursday, the bill would allow Americans to pay their taxes in Bitcoin, with those funds being used to grow the U.S. stockpile.

title: Ethereum’s Fusaka Upgrade Signals New Era for Value Accrual: Fidelity Digital Assets
contentSnippet: The upgrade marks a sharper strategic turn for the blockchain, aligning protocol development with economic intent and strengthening the case for ether.

title: 21Shares launches leveraged Dogecoin ETF as FalconX acquisition finalizes
contentSnippet: Although own and controlled by FalconX, 21shares will remain independently managed and run by CEO Russell Barlow.

title: What Next For XRP as Bitcoin Loses $90,000 Level Again
contentSnippet: Institutional activity declined significantly, and the market remains pressured by Bitcoin's weak structure and ETF outflows.

title: Kraken’s IPO Play: Why the Crypto Exchange Is Racing Toward the Public Markets
contentSnippet: The exchange’s confidential filing comes amid clearer regulatory signals, a market pullback and a wave of crypto firms testing public markets.

title: Crypto coalition calls on Trump to direct federal agencies to expedite stalled tax and regulatory guidance
contentSnippet: Crypto groups are calling on President Donald Trump to direct the Treasury Department and the IRS to issue long-overdue tax guidance.

title: Cipher Mining lands full-site Fluidstack lease, moves to raise $333 million for Texas expansion
contentSnippet: AI lease commitments are stacking up, with Cipher’s total contracted HPC revenue climbing just weeks after sealing $5-billion deal with AWS.

title: Ethereum treasury FG Nexus, once eager to raise up to $5 billion, sells over 10,000 ETH to fund share buybacks
contentSnippet: In August, FG Nexus filed paperwork with the SEC so it could potentially raise as much as $5 billion to buy Ethereum.

title: Coinbase adds ETH-backed loans via Morpho, letting users borrow up to $1 million
contentSnippet: Coinbase now allows users to borrow up to $1 million in USDC against ETH, expanding its onchain loan product offered via Morpho.

title: Bitcoin attempts ‘fragile lift’ as Fed signals patience on rate cuts
contentSnippet: Bitcoin briefly revisted $93,000 after ETF inflows but analysts warn that onchain metrics signal uncertainty around price action.

title: Metaplanet plans another $95 million bitcoin purchase after MERCURY preferred shares raise
contentSnippet: Metaplanet plans to raise ¥21.25 billion (about $135 million) through the new Class B preferred share issuance.

title: Record Financial Pushes Real-Time Royalties on Avalanche to Modernize Music Payments
contentSnippet: Record Financial’s push for on-chain royalties is gaining traction among labels and artists seeking faster, more transparent payouts.

title: Morning Minute: Ethereum Rolls Out 'Interop Layer' for Single Unified Chain Vision
contentSnippet: The Ethereum Interoperability Layer will let any Ethereum L2 talk to any other L2, resolving one of its main user experience issues.

title: Warner Music Moves From Litigation to Licensing With Udio
contentSnippet: The AI music generator will transition to a licensed model where artists control participation and receive compensation.

title: Sequence Aims to Take the Complexity Out of Crypto Payments With Trails
contentSnippet: Infrastructure firm Sequence seeks to solve crypto's fragmentation problem with Trails, a platform to simplify payments across chains.

title: Bitcoin ETF Flows Turn Positive, But Experts Warn of Defensive Shift
contentSnippet: Bitcoin ETFs saw inflows of $75 million, ending a five-day rout as experts see institutions defensively repositioning amid a market retreat.

title: NFT and memecoin markets recover after month-long crypto slump
contentSnippet: NFTs posted selective gains led by blue chips, while memecoins rallied broadly across major names in a sentiment-driven rebound.

title: NFTs hit the brakes: Market cap tanks 46% in just 30 days
contentSnippet: CoinGecko data shows the NFT market value has nearly halved in a month, with even top collections like BAYC and CryptoPunks losing ground.

title: Valve’s Counter-Strike 2 update crashes $5.8B economy, revives NFT debate
contentSnippet: A major update to Counter-Strike 2’s item mechanics wiped nearly $2 billion from its $5.8 billion skin market, igniting debate over central control in gaming.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run
contentSnippet: Coinbase has paid $25 million for an NFT that compels the once popular crypto podcast UpOnly to restart. Bull market vibes anyone?

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s nationwide gambling authority said user rewards on the platform feature the element of chance, categorizing them as gambling.

title: Fear returns to the crypto market as $230B vanishes overnight
contentSnippet: Investor sentiment turned sharply bearish as crypto’s fear index plunged to 28, and $230 billion in value evaporated in a single day.

title: NFT markets rebound after $1.2B wipeout in Friday’s crypto crash
contentSnippet: Top Ethereum NFT collections like BAYC, Pudgy Penguins and CryptoPunks remain in the red despite a partial market recovery after Friday’s crypto market crash.

title: Sorare CEO still bullish on Ethereum despite ‘upgrading’ to Solana
contentSnippet: Fantasy sports crypto platform Sorare is migrating from Ethereum to Solana, with its CEO saying it is a better fit for Sorare due to its scalability and focus on consumer applications.

title: How to use Google’s Gemini to research coins before you invest
contentSnippet: Google’s Gemini AI can help organize research, compare tokenomics and cut through noise. Here’s a workflow to analyze coins before you invest responsibly.
